title: Make the reminder (low-stock warning) background lighter and brighter

requirements.text: Update the reminder/low-stock warning background color to be lighter and brighter than the current design by adjusting the low-stock theme tokens used for the banner and low-stock table-row highlights.

quotes: 1.. Warna backgound  2. lebih cerah dari yang sekarang 3. lebih light

acceptanceCriteria: On the Dashboard, the low-stock reminder banner background appears visibly lighter/brighter than before.
Low-stock highlighted rows (e.g., the Dashboard inventory table and the low-stock banner table rows) use the updated lighter/brighter background consistently.
Text and icons on top of the updated background remain readable with sufficient contrast in both light mode and dark mode.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Keep all user-facing text in English (do not introduce new non-English labels while making this styling change).
nonGoals: No changes to low-stock detection logic, inventory thresholds, or any backend behavior.
No layout or copy changes to the reminder/low-stock banner beyond background color styling.
